data.title: My Chemical Romance
data.meta_description: Read stories about #accident, #alfiedeyes, and #avenged on Wattpad, recommended by MotionlessTragedy
data.text:
Another Reason To Live (Watty Awards 2014)

She, Scarlette, could give you a list of reasons defending her decision to end her life. She could go on and on about how it isn't fair that her foster family is looked down upon by the community, all because her brother is gay. She could tell you how hard it is to focus in school because of the bullies. She could tel...

Completed

What Makes You So Angry? (MCR)

Rose Butler, sister of Marcus Butler, she's eighteen and has a reputation of being the badass. But life isn't like the movies where she falls easily in love with a badguy, or has loads of friends like her, or has a family who were like her when they were younger. She's a loner and angry. She gets kicked out of her hom...

Completed

A Taste of Chaos (MCR/A7x Fan Fic) Part One

Ever since she was given up for adoption right after birth, Gerard and Mikey Way have vowed to find her; their long lost baby sister, Anna Lee Way. Ironically, at 18, she scores VIP tickets to see MCR in concert. Little does she know, her world is about to change completely as the guys offer to take her in and make up...

Completed

The World Is Ours.

Sophie & Gerard are about to celebrate Pete & Clary's first birthday, and they couldn't be happier, until something unexpected happens... This is Book 3, Please read Book 1: Some Secrets Are Best Kept Secret and Book 2: You Are My Future before reading this one, as it's follows on the storyline. Gerard Way Fanfic Ma...

Completed

Some Secrets Are Best Kept Secret.

Sophie and her family move from England to America and she catches the eye of one of the neighbours, who happens to be a teacher at her new school..... Gerard Way Fanfic. May include strong language and sexual references.

Completed

You Are My Future.

Sophie And Gerard are about to enter the next chapter in their lives: getting married. They begin to face obstacles in their lives that could drive them apart and their future may not be set in stone like they thought. Gerard Way Fanfic. This is book 2, please read book 1: Some Secrets Are Best Kept Secret, before re...

Completed

The Lone Killjoy (Party Poison/Gerard Way fanfic)

Meet Spark killer. A killjoy who walks alone. She refuses to get close to anyone or anything, knowing that getting attached to anyone will just hurt her. She learned that the hard way. But when she saves the lives of four killjoys, she finds herself drawn to their redhead leader, despite her vow. And no matter how ha...

Completed

Unexpected Love -Sequel of "I Need You to Stay"

Lisa and Gerard have had their ups and downs but when Lisa goes to university everything seems to be perfect until see finds out something that changes her and Gerard's lives forever.

The World Is Ugly, But You're Beautiful To Me. (Gerard Way FanFiction)

Elodea Sothabella just moved away from Illinois to New Jersey and it's her first day of high school. Back at her old school, she only had one friend because of her style. So, of course, she's freaking out. She makes friends with Mikey Way and he introduces her to the rest of MCR, which, in this story, is sadly not a b...

I Need You to Stay

Lisa is an ordinary girl who is just a fan of My Chemical Romance but when she goes to one of their concerts she steals the lead singer's heart. Does Gerard need Lisa more than Lisa needs him? Will this love last?

Completed

Teenagers

"Looks like the bad boy is growing soft for someone" " Shut up" What happens when the new girl in school gets Gerard wrapped around her finger.

Completed

Drinking By The Mausoleum Door

Gerard was visiting his grandma's grave. Just a normal routine. Then as he was heading back to his car he saw her. She was covered in blood. Her long black hair was matted in it. She was sat on the mausoleum steps, holding her side and drinking a bottle of vodka. He couldn't just walk away. She needed help. After a lo...

The Lonely Road

Gerard Way finds a cute girl in his philosophy class. Without knowing if he will fall for her. Without knowing that she has a problem. Without knowing if he will be able to deal with that problem. Without knowing he is the remedy for her problem. That problem is named Blurry

Disenchanted (NIF Sequel)

Dun Dun here it is!! Sequel to Nothing Is Forever. If you haven't read it then go read it before continuing with this one! It's been almost 4 years since she left.. she promised to move on, until she sees him again.. Will her feelings come back or will she simply walk away from him again? I do not own MCR/BVB or the M...

Completed Mature

Nothing Is Forever (Gerard Way Love Story)

Briella meets the love of her life when her mom uproots their life to New Jersey to go live with her new boyfriend. Life for them send to be going great until a dark past comes back to haunt them. Years afterwards a new betrayal causes Briella to think things through and make a decision and quick. I hope you guys enjo...

Completed

Love Is The Weapon | Gerard Way x Reader

In which a transferred student falls in love with the school's bully but gets to find out she isn't just a pretty face who hits people. Gerard Way x Reader [female]

Completed

Millions || Gerard Way

'Alright ladies and gentleman, this is a robbery and if you want to make it out alive I suggest you get against that wall right fucking now!' ~~~ I've got ADHD, problems socializing AND anger issues. Why did I have to get caught up in this? I was supposed to be giving my friend her cup of coffee then going to a day at...

Completed

Room H271 (mcr)

"You can never leave. You never will leave." Gerard is trapped. Trapped in a place which he cannot escape from, tormented by its four white walls, the people that despise him, the screaming voices that surround him but most of all his mind. His family have left him, they no longer seem to care, and all he has left is...

Completed Mature

When The Sun Goes Black -Gerard Way / Killjoy Fanfic

Book 4 of the Killjoy Series Ivy Greyson. The life within death, the tragedy within the smoke. She lives with the weight of her sorrow. The life she was onced fulfilled, now ash blinding the reality within itself. It's all a dream. It couldn't possibly be this horrific. The dream she wishes she's dreaming, becomes all...

Mature

Kiss The Ring

Gerard Way is a prince. Samantha is engaged to the prince. But the engagement was arranged, so Sam really didn't want to marry him. But when she meets Gerard, things aren't what they seem. This story takes place in New Jersey. There is no president, just the king and queen ruling.

Friends With Benefits (Gerard Way FanFiction)

Jovie Hamilton is just any other scene 18 year old girl into art and kickass rock bands, She ends up attending New Jersey college of visual arts. She doesn't believe in love...until she meets her roommate Gerard Way, but best friends cant have sex, maybe they can be friends with benefits. Can they keep their dirty lit...

Completed Mature

Delinquents (Gerard Way X OC)

Gerard, Mikey, Frank, Bob, and Ray are nothing but trouble. They're delinquents, rebels, punks. They were once outcasts that got bullied everyday, but they got their revenge and are now the most feared kids in school. Nobody dared to talk to them or even look at them. If they did they would get a severe ass beating. ...

Completed Mature
